## Options.config property

The object providing initial configuration values.

Signature:

```typescript
config?: Partial<Configuration>;
```

## Remarks

It is probable that extensions and services will modify values introduced in this object. If you are looking to simply modify configuration values it is generally a better idea to use the instead.
